name: Di-Da-Dobble
description:
A weird Yahtzee-like toy. Roll your beloved dice, collect cool props like plants, worms, and snacks by opening presents, and climb the ranks on the Di-Da-Dobble leaderboards!!!

Features
  • Cool smooth visuals 🎨
  • A cute gnome character 🥳
  • An original soundtrack consisting of 9 tracks 🎵
  • 25 props to collect 🌱🥨🚬
  • Online leaderboards, wow! 🏆
    I
  • t's just relaxing 🧸
